description: Must support both a skill that hits enemies, and a hex curse skill to work. The hex will be applied when enemies are hit by the other skill. Cannot support totems, traps, or mines. Minions cannot apply hexes this way.

mods.text: Supported Skills deal % increased Damage with Hits and Ailments per Curse on Enemy

mods: Supported Skills apply supported Curses on Hit
Supported Skills have (12–50)% reduced Curse Duration
You cannot Cast Supported Curse Spells
name: Hextouch Support
